```{r}
library(top)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
n = 1000
p = 100

library(Matrix)
library(mvtnorm)
library(dplyr)


sigma1 = (matrix(rnorm(p * p, mean = 1, sd = 1), nrow = p, ncol = p) %>% Matrix::nearPD())$mat %>% as.matrix() %>% cov2cor()
sigma2 = (matrix(rnorm(p * p, mean = 5, sd = 1), nrow = p, ncol = p) %>% Matrix::nearPD())$mat %>% as.matrix() %>% cov2cor()
# x1 = matrix(rnorm(n * p, mean = 0, sd = 1), nrow = n, ncol = p)
# x2 = x1 + 0.2
x1 = mvtnorm::rmvnorm(n = n, sigma = sigma1)
x2 = mvtnorm::rmvnorm(n = n, sigma = sigma2)

sigma1[1:5, 1:5]
sigma2[1:5, 1:5]

colnames(x1) = colnames(x2) = paste0("X", 1:p)
k = 2
beta = c(rep(0.4, k), rep(0, p - k))

expit = function(x) 1/(1+exp(-x))
y1 = rbinom(n, 1, prob = expit(x1 %*% beta))
y2 = rbinom(n, 1, prob = expit(x2 %*% beta))

table(y1)
table(y2)

plot(colMeans(x1), colMeans(x2))
top::identityDist(colMeans(x1), colMeans(x2))
abline(a = 0, b = 1, col = "red")


# z1 = pairwise_col_diff(x1)
# z2 = pairwise_col_diff(x2)
w = compute_weights(x1, x2)
nIter = 20

top1_result = top1(x1, x2, y1, y2, w, nIter = 20, alpha = 1, s = "lambda.min")

plot(colMeans(x1)[top1_result], colMeans(x2)[top1_result])
top::identityDist(colMeans(x1)[top1_result], colMeans(x2)[top1_result])
abline(a = 0, b = 1, col = "red")



s = "lambda.min"

top2_result = top2_sign(x1, x2, y1, y2, top1_result = top1_result, s = "lambda.min", nIter = 20, intercept = FALSE)

plot(colMeans(x1)[top2_result], colMeans(x2)[top2_result])
top::identityDist(colMeans(x1)[top2_result], colMeans(x2)[top2_result])
abline(a = 0, b = 1, col = "red")


top3_result = top3(x1, x2, y1, y2, top2_result = top2_result, intercept = FALSE)

plot(predict(top3_result$en1, newx = x1[,top2_result], s = "lambda.min"),
predict(top3_result$en2, newx = x1[,top2_result], s = "lambda.min"))
abline(a = 0, b = 1)

top::identityDist(
predict(top3_result$en1, newx = x1[,top2_result], s = "lambda.min"),
predict(top3_result$en2, newx = x1[,top2_result], s = "lambda.min"))

top::plot_top_coef(top3_result, type = "scatter")
top::plot_top_coef(top3_result, type = "bar")
top::plot_top_coef(top3_result, type = "text")
```


# Ridge on all features
```{r}
lasso1 = glmnet::cv.glmnet(
  x = x1,
  y = y1,
  family = "binomial", alpha = 0)

lasso2 = glmnet::cv.glmnet(
  x = x2,
  y = y2,
  family = "binomial", alpha = 0)


plot(predict(lasso1, newx = x1, s = "lambda.min"),
     predict(lasso2, newx = x1, s = "lambda.min"))
abline(a = 0, b = 1)

top::identityDist(
  predict(lasso1, newx = x1, s = "lambda.min"),
  predict(lasso2, newx = x1, s = "lambda.min"))
```


# Ridge on Step1 features
```{r}
lasso1 = glmnet::cv.glmnet(
  x = x1[,top1_result],
  y = y1,
  family = "binomial", alpha = 0)

lasso2 = glmnet::cv.glmnet(
  x = x2[,top1_result],
  y = y2,
  family = "binomial", alpha = 0)


plot(predict(lasso1, newx = x1[,top1_result], s = "lambda.min"),
     predict(lasso2, newx = x1[,top1_result], s = "lambda.min"))
abline(a = 0, b = 1)

top::identityDist(
  predict(lasso1, newx = x1[,top1_result], s = "lambda.min"),
  predict(lasso2, newx = x1[,top1_result], s = "lambda.min"))
```


```{r}
upper_elements = function(x){x[upper.tri(x)]}
```

```{r}
boxplot(
  upper_elements(cor(x1)) - upper_elements(cor(x2)),
  upper_elements(cor(x1[,top1_result])) - upper_elements(cor(x2[,top1_result])),
        upper_elements(cor(x1[,top2_result])) - upper_elements(cor(x2[,top2_result])))
```
